name: Conquest of the Outer Space
description:
Guide your little cute alien to the victory in this platformer and base build game!

Your mission is to get as many flags as you can, playing solo conquering planets, or either invading other player's bases!

But be carefull because other player will also try to steal your flags, so be sure you design the best base possible to prevent other players from invade it sucefully!

To come:  New planets, everytime you enter a new planet you unlock acces to new traps and setups for your base!
